Messier Survey, LLC

Land Surveyors

Messier Survey, LLC (successor to Messier & Associates, Inc.) is a full service professional Land Surveying firm providing personalized “hands-on” professional services to private and public clients in the residential, commercial, industrial, institutional and municipal sectors from its office headquarters in Manchester, Connecticut.
